functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Burning Iron\",\"color\":\"dark_red\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"A repurposed branding iron once","color":"gray"}','{"text":"used by the Subjugate to brand","color":"gray"}','{"text":"undead prisoners. It was later used","color":"gray"}','{"text":"to fend off undead who crawl out","color":"gray"}','{"text":"of the Depths, and is quite effective","color":"gray"}','{"text":"at doing so, but not so much as","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Burning Salt.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Damage: 6","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Stamina Cost: 4","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Stamina Regeneration Delay: 2s","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Burns Foes","color":"gray"}']},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"generic.attackDamage",Amount:5,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:550742,UUIDMost:87125588,Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"generic.attackSpeed",Operation:0,Amount:1020,UUIDLeast:9300079,UUIDMost:10048,Slot:"mainhand"}],Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:fire_aspect",lvl:1}],HideFlags:7,Unbreakable:1b,HoldingID:45}
